text: Álvaro Enrique Arzú Yrigoyen (14 March 1946 - 27 April 2018) was a Guatemalan politician. He was the 32nd President of Guatemala from January 14, 1996 until January 14, 2000. He was elected Mayor of Guatemala City five times and served his fifth term from 2004 until his death in 2018."Gana Álvaro Colom la primera vuelta de las presidenciales guatemaltecas," La Jornada. On April 27, 2018, Arzú suffered a heart attack while playing golf with his son in Guatemala City. He died in the hospital later that day.Cumes y Eduardo González, William. 2018. Muere Álvaro Arzú por un infarto in Prensa Libre. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1946 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Presidents of Guatemala Category:Guatemalan mayors Category:People from Guatemala City
title: Álvaro Arzú
